1.0.name: wordpress/lazyest-stack
1.0.description:
Based on Beautiful Photo Stack Gallery with jQuery and CSS3

This plugin requires Lazyest Gallery version 1.0 or higher.

The plugin shows the albums as a slider, and when an album is chosen, it shows the images of that album as a photo stack. In the photo stack view, you can browse through the images by putting the top most image behind all the stack with a slick animation.

The plugin uses jQuery and CSS3 properties for the rotated image effect. It also uses the webkit-box-reflect property in order to mirror the boxes in the album view – check out the demo in Google Chrome or Apple Safari to see this wonderful effect.
